parentProduct.title: Clinical Data Acquisition Standards Harmonization Model Version 1.2

description: This SDTM class contains a set of domains which do not conform to the Findings, Events or Interventions observation classes. The domains included are DM, CO, SE and SV. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, GNRLOBSC, C103377, 2021-06-25)
label: Special-Purpose
name: Special-Purpose
